Compliance & Safety

At Free AI Tools, we are committed to maintaining a safe and compliant platform. Our automated systems are designed to filter and exclude any content that could be considered Not Safe For Work (NSFW), explicit, or otherwise inappropriate. We strive to create a resource that is accessible and useful for everyone, including students, researchers, and professionals.

If you encounter any content that you believe violates this policy, please contact us through our GitHub issues page.

About Compliance
